name: Patrick

projects.title: Unearthed
projects.description: Processing JS Game Design and Development

services.title: Frontend Design and Development
services.description: I've designed and implemented the front end for all my solo IOS projects, as well as working as the Frontend Developer for a startup ground, Blind, developing a new kind of messaging service.

services.title: Data Science and AI Design
services.description: Much of my collegiate work has been based in Artifical Intelligence, where I have learned how to design and train Deep Learning and other relevant models for multiple use cases.

services.title: Business Management
services.description: I earned a business minor through the Ross School of Business at the University of Michigan, and co-own Agos Artistry LLC with my business partner Design Rodgers.

services.title: Leadership and Creator Development
services.description: Helped lead Shift Creator Space at the University of Michigan for my final 2 years of college, where I mentored 30+ creators through their own paths to making a final artistic or technological project.

aboutpara: I am currently a senior Computer Science student at the University of Michigan, planning to work as a Software Engineer at Bloomberg LP next year. In my off time, I enjoy climbing, working out, waterskiing, and reading good fiction.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.
